sources.title: Behave Yourself
sources.description: Actors: Farley Granger; Shelley Winters; William Demarest; Lon Chaney, Jr.; Elisha Cook, Jr.; Hans Conried; Sheldon Leonard; Don Beddoe; King Donovan; Herb Vigran Runtime: 1:19:56 Audacity was used to reduce noise. The Matroska (.mkv) file is the uploaded file; download it if your player can handle h.265 (HEVC).
